Caption: Figure 2. The multimodal imaging system: (a) lateral view and (b) rear view.
Mention:
The multimodal imaging system includes a 
multispectral imaging module, a digital visible RGB 
COTS camera, a thermal camera, a spectrometer, a frame 
grabber and an onboard computer. The multimodal 
imaging system is shown in Figure 2. The multispectral 
module shown in Figure 3(a) consists of a monochrome 
camera coupled with an electronically tuned LCTF (Figure 
3(b)). A wide angle lens is mounted on the monochrome 
camera (Sony XC-75) and this is coupled with the LCTF
